summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3720 for the improvement of Angeline Street, from 39th Avenue South to 43rd Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45695, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
